title: Get rid of %HP true damage
body: It's literally the worst designed concept of all time. A type of damage in the game that has no counterplay should not exist. Period. There's not a single design point that you can point to that makes %HP true damage a thing that should exist.

replies.body: I want to remind everyone that the op said amount of "%HP true damage" ..emhpasis on true... and not just %HP damage
*Waiting for the "i dont want tank meta" comments*

only 3 champions in the game have it. two of them have it bound to mechanics with counterplay.

{{champion:114}} protect your vitals

{{champion:86}} only against the villain. stay out of the spin and mind his cooldown windows


the other is {{champion:67}} , and she needs it either removed or tied to a mechanic that you can actually play around instead of chunking you for 14% on every second auto attack and/or tumble and/or e.

Yeah, if only Vayne had to like keep attacking the target to get the TD, and only can attack the same target without it falling off, meaning if you bring multiple people she isn’t as effective.

" free resists that up to 40 armor and magic resist wow."
